SoftDeletable - Interface in org.jcatapult.persistence.domain
This interface marks a class as never being deleted permanently from the database.

TimeStampable - Interface in org.jcatapult.persistence.domain
This interface defines an Entity that has time stamp information for when the database record was created and last updated.

Transaction - Interface in org.jcatapult.persistence.service
This class is a transaction facade that provides all the methods that most transactions will require and that all the backing implementations should support.
transaction() - Method in class org.jcatapult.persistence.txn.DefaultTransactionState
 
transaction() - Method in interface org.jcatapult.persistence.txn.TransactionState
 
Transactional - Annotation Type in org.jcatapult.persistence.txn.annotation
This annotation can be placed on methods and used by Guice to add transactional handling to any method.
TransactionManager - Interface in org.jcatapult.persistence.txn
This interface defines the operations that are used by the TransactionMethodInterceptor in order to provide AOP transaction support around method invocations.
TransactionMethodInterceptor - Class in org.jcatapult.persistence.txn
This is the AOP method interceptor that JCatapult uses with Guice's AOP engine in order to provide transaction support around methods.
TransactionMethodInterceptor() - Constructor for class org.jcatapult.persistence.txn.TransactionMethodInterceptor
 
TransactionResultProcessor<T> - Interface in org.jcatapult.persistence.txn
This interface can be implemented and passed to the Transactional annotation.
TransactionState - Interface in org.jcatapult.persistence.txn
This interface is passed between the methods of the TransactionManager by the JCatapult transaction AOP support.

verify(Class<?>) - Method in class org.jcatapult.persistence.service.jpa.JPAPersistenceService
Ensures that the entity class contains the correct annotation to be persisted.
